result.html: Arbh fhiú an doirteadh folaWas the bloodshed worth it?
result.ponchtml: Arḃ ḟiú an doirteaḋ folaWas the bloodshed worth it?

result.eng: The money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.

result.eng: You might want to improve the design.

result.eng: It is worthwhile to learn Irish.

result.eng: The trouble is worth the benefit.

result.eng: He didn't even have a driver's licence.

result.eng: I don't have time to even eat breakfast.

result.eng: I go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
result.ga: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadh

result.eng: Nobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ga: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu

result.eng: But the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.

result.eng: I guess it wasn't worth the hassle.
